## Collicat.setInputFilterSelector() method

Sets the selector identifying which input elements to filter from drag events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setInputFilterSelector(selector: string): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  selector | string | Input filter selector to set. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

Current instance; method may be chained.
